<urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn2:bic>HELGNO21XXX</urn2:bic>\r <urn2:postalAddress/>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn4:creditor>\r <urn2:name>Hobbs</urn2:name>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn1:creditorScorReference>${#TestSuite#kidVal}</urn1:creditorScorReference>\r </urn1:transaction>\r </urn:paymentMessage>\r </urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
